message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $90. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'll throw in a small discount. How about $87.50?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do a bit better. How about $82.50?
I'm not sure I can go that low, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between $87.50 and $82.50. How about $85?
